## ICancellationTokenSourceOptions interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Options for the cancellation token source.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICancellationTokenSourceOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [delayMs?](./heft.icancellationtokensourceoptions.delayms.md) |  | number | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Amount of time in milliseconds to wait before cancelling the token. |
